__e: The devil is riding this wind!
She was jumping up and down on top of me.
And he is headed toward my house!
What are you doing riding round and round up here?
Why don't you girls go on ahead and we'll join you.
And now you ride beside me as calmly as I would ride to church.
Even now, he rides to meet you and secure the sword.
is he here as a mere spectator or is he competing?
Oh, I certainly hope he isn't, because if so, he'll find himself in a trap.
Ride with me, my bastard army, to the only future allowed us.
"a father rides with his son through night and wind.
Ride with me against my enemies and you shall have all my son promised you and more.
Last time I saw him, he was going east, but you know him, he is liable to go north, south, or west.

Dne riding the north loop, the other the west.

Her daughter rides horses, but always alone.
And in the dream, I knew that he was going on ahead. And he was fixing to make a fire somewhere out there in all that dark and all that cold.
